'''Alpha v1.0.16_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on August 13, 2010.<ref>{{ytl|BXV8cil0lZo|Cannon as High Speed Transport|MrDopekitten|August 15, 2010}}</ref> Corresponding server version [[Alpha server 0.1.3|0.1.3]] was released on August 17, 2010.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Commands]]'''
* {{cmd|tell}}
** For players to whisper things to other players.
* {{cmd|list}} 
** Shows a list of connected players to the operator who issued it.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Operators can now build in the spawn area.
* The server logs which admin does what, and broadcasts any admin events to all connected operators.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed {{cmd|save-off}}.{{More info|What exactly?}}
* Fixed a bug relating to the deaths of players and mobs.{{More info|What exactly?}}

== Trivia ==
* The infamous [[Herobrine]] hoax screenshot was taken in this version. The [[world seed]] in which it was taken is <code>478868574082066804</code> at coordinates: X=5.0602, Y=71, Z=-298.5365<ref>https://minecraftathome.com/projects/herobrine.html</ref>
